document_data.mainbody:
Blackroot beer was one of the more exotic highlights on the Dryads Dreams menu, the only festhall in Mosstone, Tethyr.
Blackroot beer was an alcoholic beverage distilled out of the blackroot herb. The resulting conception was very thick, considered to be an entire meal in a tankard. Volothamp Geddarm once stated that the drink was so viscous that it almost needed to be chewed.
Blackroot beer was served at the Dryads Dreams in the mid-to-late-14 century DR. The beverage was featured in one of Volothamp Geddarms published travel guides.
